00020 #include <cstring>
00021 
00022 #include <com/xuggle/ferry/Logger.h>
00023 #include <com/xuggle/ferry/JNIMemoryManager.h>
00024 
00025 #include <com/xuggle/ferry/Buffer.h>

00029 namespace com { namespace xuggle { namespace ferry
00030 {
00031   uint8_t Buffer :: mTypeSize[] = {
00032       // Must be in right order
00033       sizeof(uint8_t),
00034       sizeof(int8_t),
00035       sizeof(uint16_t),
00036       sizeof(int16_t),
00037       sizeof(uint32_t),
00038       sizeof(int32_t),
00039       sizeof(uint64_t),
00040       sizeof(int64_t),
00041       sizeof(float),
00042       sizeof(double),
00043       0
00044   };
00045   Buffer :: Buffer() : mBuffer(0), mBufferSize(0)
00046   {
00047     mFreeFunc = 0;
00048     mClosure = 0;
00049     mInternallyAllocated = false;
00050     mType = IBUFFER_UINT8; // bytes
00051   }
00052 
00053   Buffer :: ~Buffer()
00054   {
00055     if (mBuffer)
00056     {
00057       VS_ASSERT(mBufferSize, "had buffer but no size");
00058       if (mInternallyAllocated)
00059         JNIMemoryManager::free(mBuffer);
00060       else if (mFreeFunc)
00061         mFreeFunc(mBuffer, mClosure);
00062       mBuffer = 0;
00063       mBufferSize = 0;
00064       mFreeFunc = 0;
00065       mClosure = 0;
00066     }
00067   }
00068 
00069 
00070   void*
00071   Buffer :: getBytes(int32_t offset, int32_t length)
00072   {
00073     void* retval = 0;
00074 
00075     if (length == 0)
00076       length = mBufferSize - offset;
00077 
00078     if ((length > 0) && (length + offset <= mBufferSize))
00079       retval = ((unsigned char*) mBuffer)+offset;
00080 
00081     return retval;
00082   }
00083 
00084   int32_t
00085   Buffer :: getBufferSize()
00086   {
00087     return mBufferSize;
00088   }
00089 
00090   Buffer*
00091   Buffer :: make(com::xuggle::ferry::RefCounted* requestor, int32_t bufferSize)
00092   {
00093     Buffer* retval = 0;
00094     if (bufferSize <= 0)
00095       return 0;
00096     
00097     void * allocator = requestor ? requestor->getJavaAllocator() : 0;
00098     void *buffer = JNIMemoryManager::malloc(allocator, bufferSize);
00099     if (!buffer)
00100       return 0;
00101       
00102     retval = Buffer::make();
00103     if (!retval) {
00104       JNIMemoryManager::free(buffer);
00105       return 0;
00106     }
00107     retval->mBuffer = buffer; 
00108     retval->mBufferSize = bufferSize;
00109     retval->mInternallyAllocated = true;
00110     return retval;
00111   }
00112 
00113   Buffer*
00114   Buffer :: make(com::xuggle::ferry::RefCounted* /*unused*/, void *bufToWrap, int32_t bufferSize,
00115       FreeFunc freeFunc, void *closure)
00116   {
00117     Buffer * retval = 0;
00118     
00119     if (bufToWrap && bufferSize>0)
00120     {
00121       retval = Buffer::make();
00122       if (retval)
00123       {
00124         retval->mFreeFunc = freeFunc;
00125         retval->mClosure = closure;
00126         retval->mBufferSize = bufferSize;
00127         retval->mBuffer = bufToWrap;
00128         retval->mInternallyAllocated = false;
00129       }
00130     }
00131     return retval;
00132   }
00133   
00134   IBuffer::Type
00135   Buffer :: getType()
00136   {
00137     return mType;
00138   }
00139   
00140   void
00141   Buffer :: setType(Type type)
00142   {
00143     mType = type;
00144   }
00145   
00146   Buffer*
00147   Buffer :: make(com::xuggle::ferry::RefCounted* requestor,
00148       Type type, int32_t numElements, bool zero)
00149   {
00150     if (numElements <= 0)
00151       return 0;
00152     if (type < 0 || type >= IBUFFER_NB)
00153       return 0;
00154     
00155     int32_t bytesRequested = numElements*mTypeSize[(int32_t)type];
00156     Buffer *retval = Buffer::make(requestor, bytesRequested);
00157     if (retval)
00158     {
00159       retval->mType = type;
00160       if (zero)
00161         memset(retval->getBytes(0, bytesRequested), 0, bytesRequested);
00162     }
00163     return retval;
00164   }
00165   
00166   int32_t
00167   Buffer :: getTypeSize(Type type)
00168   {
00169     if (type < 0 || type >= IBUFFER_NB)
00170       return 0;
00171     return mTypeSize[(int32_t)type];
00172   }
00173   
00174   int32_t
00175   Buffer :: getSize()
00176   {
00177     if (mType < 0 || mType >= IBUFFER_NB)
00178       return 0;
00179     return getBufferSize()/mTypeSize[(int32_t)mType];
00180   }
00181 }}}
